description: Yae Miko è la Guuji del Grand Narukami Shrine di Inazuma. Eccelle nel danno Electro off-field tramite i suoi totem, fornendo danno consistente e applicazione Electro.

weapons.name: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds

info: Yae Miko si concentra su danno Electro off-field tramite i totem. Priorità a CRIT, ATK% e Elemental Mastery per massimizzare i danni.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Spiritfox Sin-Eater
skills.desc: Performs up to 3 attacks using fox spirits, dealing Electro DMG.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 3 attacks using fox spirits, dealing Electro DMG.
Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Electro DMG after a short casting time.
Plunging Attack
Gathering the might of Electro, plunges toward the ground from mid-air, damaging all enemies in her path and dealing AoE Electro DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Yakan Evocation: Sesshou Sakura
skills.desc: Yae Miko creates a Sesshou Sakura that periodically strikes nearby enemies with lightning.
skills.details_html:
Yakan Evocation: Sesshou Sakura
Yae Miko creates a Sesshou Sakura that periodically strikes nearby enemies with lightning.

skills.name: Great Secret Art: Tenko Kenshin
skills.desc: Yae Miko unleashes a lightning storm, dealing massive Electro DMG to all nearby enemies.
skills.details_html:
Great Secret Art: Tenko Kenshin
Yae Miko unleashes a lightning storm, dealing massive Electro DMG to all nearby enemies.

passive_talents.name: The Shrine's Sacred Shade
passive_talents.desc: When Yae Miko creates a Sesshou Sakura, each existing Sesshou Sakura will increase the DMG of the new one by 20%.

passive_talents.name: Enlightened Blessing
passive_talents.desc: Every point of Elemental Mastery Yae Miko possesses will increase Sesshou Sakura DMG by 0.15%.

passive_talents.name: Meditations of a Yako
passive_talents.desc: Has a 25% chance to get 1 regional Character Talent Material (base material excluded) when crafting. The rarity is that of the base material.

constellations.name: Yakan Offering
constellations.desc: Each time Great Secret Art: Tenko Kenshin activates a Tenko Thunderbolt, Yae Miko will restore 8 Elemental Energy for herself.

constellations.name: Fox's Mooncall
constellations.desc: Sesshou Sakura start at Level 2 when created, their max level is increased to 4, and their attack range is increased by 60%.

constellations.name: The Seven Glamours
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Yakan Evocation: Sesshou Sakura by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Sakura Channeling
constellations.desc: When Sesshou Sakura lightning hits opponents, the Electro DMG Bonus of all nearby party members is increased by 20% for 5s.

constellations.name: Mischievous Teasing
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Great Secret Art: Tenko Kenshin by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Forbidden Art: Daisesshou
constellations.desc: The Sesshou Sakura's attacks will ignore 60% of the opponent's DEF.
